comment: An M-2 browning every mile with interlocking fields of fire and an order to shoot at any movement, with platoon size patrols in-between, all conducted by three units out of the th airborne corps, , , Combat hardened crack troops. Issue them about body bags

# ::snt An M-2 browning every mile with interlocking fields of fire and an order to shoot at any movement, with platoon size patrols in-between, all conducted by three units out of the th airborne corps, , , Combat hardened crack troops. Issue them about body bags
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / brown-01
            :ARG1 (v / vehicle
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "M-2"))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (f / field
                        :ARG1-of (ii / interlock-01)
                        :mod (f2 / fire-01))
                  :op2 (o / order-01
                        :ARG2 (s / shoot-01
                              :ARG2 (m2 / movement-07
                                    :mod (a2 / any))))
                  :op3 (p / patrol-01
                        :ARG1 (s2 / size-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (c / corps
                                                :mod (a3 / airborne)
                                                :poss (t / they)))))
                        :mod (ii2 / in-between)
                        :mod (a4 / all))
                  :frequency (r / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG1 1
                        :ARG2 (d / distance-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (m3 / mile))))
            :snt2 (ii3 / issue-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 t)
            :ARG2 (a5 / about
                  :op1 (b2 / bag
